item.title: I need a compiler
item.dc:creator: @dog_eats_dog dog eats dog
item.description:
@dog_eats_dog wrote:

Ehhh, Ill just right the code on here -.-.

@echo off
Title Dog eats Dog's Utility V2
color 0E
:menu
cls
echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo ::Type Run to Run your server
echo ::Type Compile to compile your server
echo ::Type Info on Information to who made this compiler
echo ::Type Silab to Start Silabsofts Client (Only if its in your source folder)
echo ::Type Mopar to Start the Moparscape Client (Only if its in your source folder)
echo ::Type Forums to go to Either one of the moparscape Forums
echo ::Type Error to send me and Email of the Error that has occured
echo ::Type CG to use my Command generator
echo :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
set /p option=Option:
if %option%==Run goto Run
if %option%==Compile goto Compile
if %option%==Info goto Info
if %option%==ELSE goto Wrong
if %option%==Silab goto Silab
if %option%==Mopar goto Mopar
if %option%==Forums goto Forums
if %option%==Error goto Error
if %option%==CG goto Commandgenerator 
if %option%==cg goto Commandgenerator 
:Run
@echo off
Title Running Server
cls
echo.
echo Do you wish to Run your server? Type Y for Yes , N for No
echo.
set /p option=Option:
if %option%==Y goto Yes
if %option%==y goto Yes
if %option%==N goto No
if %option%==n goto No
:Yes
cls
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause
exit
:No
cls
goto menu
:Compile
cls
Title Compiler
echo Do you wish to Compile your server? Type Y for Yes , N for No
set /p option=Option:
if %option%==Y goto Yes2
if %option%==y goto Yes2
if %option%==N goto No2
if %option%==n goto No2
:Yes2
cls
title Compiler
goto checkjavac
:compile2
if exist src (goto compile5) else (goto compile3)
:compile3
if exist *.java (goto compile4) else (goto compileerror)
:compile4
%javac% -cp . *.java
pause
cls
goto menu
:compile5
%javac% -cp . .\src\*.java
pause
move .\src\*.class .\classes\
cls
pause
goto menu
:No2
cls
goto menu
:Info
cls
echo.
echo This compiler was made by: Dog eats dog.
echo There is more Updates and Versions to come soon.
echo.
pause
goto menu
:Wrong
cls
Title Wrong answer
echo.
echo Please time in the correct Word as Described.
echo.
pause
goto menu
pause
:Silab
cls
Title Silabsofts Client
echo Would you like to start Silabsofts Client? Y for Yes - N for No
set /p option=Option:
if %option%==Y goto Yes3
if %option%==y goto Yes3
if %option%==N goto No3
if %option%==n goto No3
:Yes3
java -Xmx500m -jar client.jar 0 0 highmem members 0
pause
:No3
pause
goto menu
:Mopar
cls
Title Moparscape Client
echo Would you like to start Moparscape Client? Y for Yes - N for No
set /p option=Option:
if %option%==Y goto Yes4
if %option%==y goto Yes4
if %option%==N goto No4
if %option%==n goto No4
:Yes4
title Moparscape Bot
java -noverify -Xmx500m -cp .;./MoparScape.jar; Bot 0
::param 0 for highmem, 1 for lowmem, another 0 to make the song not startup
pause
:No4
goto menu
:Forums
cls
Title Forums
echo Which Moparscape Forums would you like to go to?
echo.
echo For Mopar is the best Forums type - Moparisthebest
echo For Moparscape.org Forums type - Moparscape
echo.
set /p option=Option:
if %option%==Moparisthebest goto Moparisthebest
if %option%==Moparscape goto Moparscape
:Moparisthebest
cls
Title Mopar is the best
echo Would you like to goto Mopar is the best Forums? Y for yes - N for No
set /p option=Option:
if %option%==Y goto Yes5
if %option%==y goto Yes5
if %option%==N goto No5
if %option%==n goto No5
:Yes5
cls
echo Must need Firefox.
pause
"%programfiles%\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe" http://www.moparisthebest.com
:No5
goto menu
:Moparscape
cls
Title Moparscape.org, Forums
echo Would you like to goto Moparscape.org Forums? Y for Yes - N for No
set /p option=Option:
if %option%==Y goto Yes6
if %option%==y goto Yes6
if %option%==N goto No6
if %option%==n goto No6
:Yes6
cls
echo Must need Firefox.
pause
"%programfiles%\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe" http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf
pause
goto menu
:Error
cls
echo.
echo If any errors occur please send me an email.
echo A Firefox window will pop up after you pust Any Key
echo Send an email Through it.
echo You need a Sending email program, Best program for this is Outlook Express
echo Send the email to shaneedwardgeorge@hotmail.com
echo.
pause
"%programfiles%\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe" mailto:
goto menu
:Commandgenerator
cls
Title Welcome to Dog eats Dog command Generator
Set /p CmdName=Command Name:?
Set /p RUSure=Are you possitive you want %CmdName% as the name?(yes,no)?
If %RUSure%==no GOTO Star
If not Exist CommandsFolder MD Commands Folder
Echo else if(command.equalsignorecase("%CmdName%")) >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt"
Echo { >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt"
cls
set /p AY=Add items to be Spawned when Input Command(yes,no)?
If %AY%==YES Goto addItem
If %AY%==yes Goto addItem
If %AY%==no Goto endCode
If %AY%==NO Goto endCode
:addItem
cls
set /p ID=What is the ID of the Wepon/Armor/Thing you have chosen?
cls
set /p Amount=How much of that Item would you like??
cls
echo     addItem(%ID%,%Amount%); >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt"
Set /P AT=Add item, add tele or finish command.(AI = Add item ,T = tele , End)
If %AT%==ai GOTO addItem
If %AT%==Ai GOTO addItem
If %AT%==AI GOTO addItem
If %AT%==aI GOTO addItem
If %AT%==T GOTO Tele
If %AT%==t GOTO Tele
If %AT%==end GOTO endCode
If %AT%==END GOTO endCode
If %AT%==EnD GOTO endCode
If %AT%==eNd GOTO endCode
If %AT%==ENd GOTO endCode
If %AT%==enD GOTO endCode
if %AT%==End Goto endcode
if %type%==* goto error
echo.
goto error
:error
cls
echo Commands invalid. Only use commands from the menu.
pause
goto menu
:endCode
cls
Echo } >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt"
Set /p Again=would you like to make AnotherMake Another (yes, No)?
If %Again%==yes GOTO Star
If %Again%==no goto fin
If %Again%==YES GOTO Star
If %Again%==NO goto fin
:Tele
cls
Set /P X=What is the XCoord?
Set /P Y=What is the YCoord?
Echo teleportToX = %X% >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt"
Echo teleportToY = %Y% >> ".\Commands\%CmdName% Command.txt"
Set /P AT=addItem Or Another Tele(not Used In Same Command Usually(AI,T,End)
If %AT%==ai GOTO addItem
If %AT%==Ai GOTO addItem
If %AT%==AI GOTO addItem
If %AT%==aI GOTO addItem
If %AT%==T GOTO Tele
If %AT%==t GOTO Tele
If %AT%==end GOTO endCode
If %AT%==END GOTO endCode
If %AT%==EnD GOTO endCode
If %AT%==eNd GOTO endCode
If %AT%==ENd GOTO endCode
If %AT%==enD GOTO endCode
if %AT%==End Goto endcode

:fin
echo You have Succesfully Created a command.
pause
cls
goto main

First person to leech of my utility, WILL die. just a friendly warning

item.title: I need a compiler
item.dc:creator: @darkstar447 darkstar447
item.description:
@darkstar447 wrote:

heres 1 m8 its not mine just saying

[code]@echo off
if exist “C:\Program Files (x86)” set programfiles=C:\Program Files (x86)
set pro=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_02
set pro2=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0
set jac=\bin\javac.exe
set jav=\bin\java.exe
:co1
set b=0
set t=7
goto co2
:co2
color %b%%t%
:menu
cls
title Shatt3r’s compiler
echo Please choose an option below to do that function.
echo.
echo compile - Compile your server.
echo Run - To Run your server.
echo Exit - To exit out of the program.
echo color - Change the Text and Backround colors of this compiler.
echo reset - Resets your Compiler Logs.
echo.
echo.
set /p c=Option:
if %c%==compile goto c
if %c%==C goto c
if %c%==r goto r
if %c%==RUn goto r
if %c%==Run goto r
if %c%==color goto color
if %c%==Color goto color
if %c%==COLOR goto color
if %c%==reset goto reset
if %c%==Reset goto reset
if %c%==RESET goto reset
if %c%==Exit goto e
if %c%==E goto e
if %c%==* goto er
goto er
:color
cls
echo Would you like to change the backround color, change
echo the text color, or reset it to default?
echo.
echo back - Change the backround color.
echo text - Change the text color.
echo def - Change all colors back to default.
echo.
echo.
set /p color=Option:
if %color%==back goto back
if %color%==BACK goto back
if %color%==text goto text
if %color%==TEXT goto text
if %color%==def goto co1
if %color%==DEF goto co1
if %color%==* goto er
goto er
:back
cls
echo Please select a color to change the backround to:
echo.
echo black
echo white
echo red
echo yellow
echo green
echo blue
echo purple
echo.
echo.
set /p back=Color:
if %back%== black (set b=0)
if %back%== white (set b=7)
if %back%== red (set b=4)
if %back%== yellow (set b=6)
if %back%== green (set b=2)
if %back%== blue (set b=1)
if %back%== purple (set b=5)
goto co2
:text
cls
echo Please select a color to change the text to:
echo.
echo black
echo white
echo red
echo yellow
echo green
echo blue
echo purple
echo.
echo.
set /p back=Color:
if %back%== black (set t=0)
if %back%== white (set t=7)
if %back%== red (set t=4)
if %back%== yellow (set t=6)
if %back%== green (set t=2)
if %back%== blue (set t=1)
if %back%== purple (set t=5)
goto co2
:c
cls
title Shatt3r’s compiler
goto cjc
:c2
if exist src (goto cl) else (goto c3)
:c3
if exist *.java (goto cl2) else (goto ce)
:c4
%javac% -cp . *.java
echo Files Compiled Successfully!
pause
cls
goto menu
:c5
%javac% -cp . .\src*.java
echo Files Compiled Successfully!
pause
move .\src*.class .\classes
cls
goto menu
:ce
cls
echo You need jdk6, or higher. If you have jdk6u2, edit this
echo compiler and at the top change the path to
echo set pro=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_02
echo This compiler works with jdk6, and jdk6u1
pause
cls
goto menu
:r
cls
title Shatt3r’s run-server
goto cj
:r2
set rjava=%java% -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
cls
goto r3
:r3
if exist .\classes\server.class (goto sl2) else (goto r4)
:r4
if exist .\server.class (goto sl) else (goto se)
:r5
%rjava%
pause
cls
goto menu
:r6
set rjava=
set rjava=%java% -cp .;./classes; Server
%rjava%
pause
cls
goto menu
:se
cls
title An error! Uh-oh!
echo You do not have a Server.class. Go download a server
echo that has one.
pause
cls
goto menu
:er
cls
title Error
echo Invalid command. Please make sure the commands you type
echo in are correct. Remember, I AM case sensitive.
pause
cls
goto menu
:e
cls
exit
:cjc
if exist “%pro%_06%jac%” (goto sjc) else (goto cjc2)
:cjc2
if exist “%pro%_07%jac%” (goto sjc2) else (goto cjc3)
:cjc3
if exist “%pro%_08%jac%” (goto sjc3) else (goto cjc4)
:cjc4
if exist “%pro%_09%jac%” (goto sjc4) else (goto cjc5)
:cjc5
if exist “%pro%_10%jac%” (goto sjc5) else (goto cjc6)
:cjc6
if exist “%pro2%%jac%” (goto sjc6) else (goto cjc7)
:cjc7
if exist “%pro%%jac%” (goto sjc7) else (goto cjc8)
:cjc8
if exist “%pro%_01%jac%” (goto sjc8) else (goto cjc9)
:cjc9
if exist “%pro%_02%jac%” (goto sjc9) else (goto cjc10)
:cjc10
if exist “%pro%_03%jac%” (goto sjc10) else (goto cjc11)
:cjc11
if exist “%pro%_04%jac%” (goto sjc11) else (goto cjc12)
:cjc12
if exist “%pro%_05%jac%” (goto sjc12) else (goto je)
:sjc
set javac="%pro%_06%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc2
set javac="%pro%_07%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc3
set javac="%pro%_08%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc4
set javac="%pro%_09%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc5
set javac="%pro%_10%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc6
set javac="%pro2%%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc7
set javac="%pro%%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc8
set javac="%pro%_01%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc9
set javac="%pro%_02%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc10
set javac="%pro%_03%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc11
set javac="%pro%_04%jac%"
goto c2
:sjc12
set javac="%pro%_05%jac%"
goto c2
:cj
if exist “%pro%_06%jav%” (goto sj) else (goto cj2)
:cj2
if exist “%pro%_07%jav%” (goto sj2) else (goto cj3)
:cj3
if exist “%pro%_08%jav%” (goto sj3) else (goto cj4)
:cj4
if exist “%pro%_09%jav%” (goto sj4) else (goto cj5)
:cj5
if exist “%pro%_10%jav%” (goto sj5) else (goto cj6)
:cj6
if exist “%pro2%%jav%” (goto sj6) else (goto cj7)
:cj7
if exist “%pro%%jav%” (goto sj7) else (goto cj8)
:cj8
if exist “%pro%_01%jav%” (goto sj8) else (goto cj9)
:cj9
if exist “%pro%_02%jav%” (goto sj9) else (goto cj10)
:cj10
if exist “%pro%_03%jav%” (goto sj10) else (goto cj11)
:cj11
if exist “%pro%_04%jav%” (goto sj11) else (goto cj12)
:cj12
if exist “%pro%_05%jav%” (goto sj12) else (goto je)
:sj
set java="%pro%_06%jav%"
goto r2
:sj2
set java="%pro%_07%jav%"
goto r2
:sj3
set java="%pro%_08%jav%"
goto r2
:sj4
set java="%pro%_09%jav%"
goto r2
:sj5
set java="%pro%_10%jav%"
goto r2
:sj6
set java="%pro2%%jav%"
goto r2
:sj7
set java="%pro%%jav%"
goto r2
:sj8
set java="%pro%_01%jav%"
goto r2
:sj9
set java="%pro%_02%jav%"
goto r2
:sj10
set java="%pro%_03%jav%"
goto r2
:sj11
set java="%pro%_04%jav%"
goto r2
:sj12
set java="%pro%_05%jav%"
goto r2
:je
cls
title Error
echo You need jdk6, or higher. If you have jdk6u2, edit this
echo compiler and at the top change the path to
echo set pro=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_02
echo This compiler works with jdk6, and jdk6u1
pause
cls
goto menu
:sl
cls
echo Ran Server at %time% and on %date%. >> “Compile Logs.txt”
echo Server was run using %java%. >> “Compile Logs.txt”
echo Thank-you for using Mod Taharok’s ‘Perfect’ Compiler! >> “Compile Logs.txt”
echo. >> “Compile Logs.txt”
goto r5
:sl2
cls
echo Ran Server at %time% and on %date%. >> “Compile Logs.txt”
echo Server was run using %java%. >> “Compile Logs.txt”
echo Thank-you for using Shatt3r’s Compiler! >> “Compile Logs.txt”
echo. >> “Compile Logs.txt”
goto r6
:cl
cls
echo Compiled Java files at %time% and on %date%. >> “Compile Logs.txt”
echo Java files were compiled using %javac%. >> “Compile Logs.txt”
echo Thank-you for using Shatt3r’s Compiler! >> “Compile Logs.txt”
echo. >> “Compile Logs.txt”
goto c5
:cl2
cls
echo Compiled Java files at %time% and on %date%. >> “Compile Logs.txt”
echo Java files were compiled using %javac%. >> “Compile Logs.txt”
echo Thank-you for using Shatt3r’s Compiler! >> “Compile Logs.txt”
echo. >> “Compile Logs.txt”
goto c4
:reset
cls
echo Resetting the Compiler’s Logs…
pause
del “Compile Logs.txt”
echo ----------Compiler Logs---------- >> “Compile Logs.txt”
echo. >> “Compile Logs.txt”
goto menu

[/code]
hope it works and hope i helped
